Class RayTracePipeline

java.lang.Object
Kartoffel.Licht.Vulkan.RayTracePipeline
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable, Pipeline, VulkanFreeable, VulkanObject
public class RayTracePipeline extends Object implements Pipeline, VulkanFreeable
Ray tracing pipelines consist of multiple ShaderStages, fixed-function traversal stages, and a PipelineLayout.
See Also:
